main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Oakridge, Tennessee on July 26, 1947.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, metallic, disc-shaped object hovering in the sky,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes before the object rapidly accelerated and disappeared,Several employees of the Oakridge facility reported the incident,The investigation was part of Project Blue Book conducted by the United States Air Force,Photographs obtained during the incident were of poor quality and did not provide definitive evidence.
